form.a2: Notify on data change in form

a22.l: select DISTINCT cast(concat(caption,'-(',name,')') as varchar(250)) cap,name from tstructs order by 1

select cast(opr as varchar(100)) opr from (select 'Equal to' opr union all select 'Not equal to' union all select 'Greater than' union all select 'Lesser than' union all select 'In' union all select 'Not in')a
select cast(cnd as varchar(100)) cnd from (select 'And' cnd union all select 'Or' union all select 'And(' union all select 'Or(' union all select '(' union all select ')')a

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:stransid union all select concat('AxVars_',b.db_function,'-(',a.db_vartype,db_varname,')') fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid union all select 'Login username-(cusername)' fldcaption,'username' fname,'appvars' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select concat(caption,'-(',datatype,fname,')') fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',3 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' )a order by 4,1
select fn_ruledef_formula( :formula,'T','F','','','v1')ad_cdhistory

select cast(cnd as varchar(100)) cnd,flg,0 ord from (select 'Creator'cnd,1 flg union all select 'Reporting manager',3 union all select 'Skip manager',4 union all select 'From form field',6 flg union all select 'User groups',8 flg union all select 'User names',9 flg )a order by flg

select string_agg(case cnd when 'Creator' then '1' when 'Reporting manager' then '3' when 'Skip manager' then '4' when 'From form field' then '6' when 'User groups' then '8' when 'User names' then '9' end,',') from (select regexp_split_to_table( :notifyto ,',')cnd)a
SELECT groupname from axusergroups order by 1
select username from axusers where active='T' order by 1
select caption,fname from axpflds where tstruct = :Stransid order by 1

whatsapp_usernames.a2: Send WhatsApp message to selected users

a22.l: select username from axusers where active='T' order by username

whatsapp_formfield.a2: Send WhatsApp message to external people

a22.l: select caption,fname from axpflds where tstruct = :Stransid order by 1

a22.l: select username from axusers where active='T' order by 1
select caption,fname from axpflds where tstruct = :Stransid order by 1

notify_msg_prints.a2: Print forms to be attached with notification for new/edited data

a22.l: select caption from axfastlink where transid = :Stransid order by 1

select groupname from axusergroups order by 1
select username from axusers order by 1
select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500)) cap,fname from axpflds where tstruct = :stransid order by 1

select username from axusers order by 1
select cast(concat(caption,'-(',fname,')') as varchar(500)) cap,fname from axpflds where tstruct = :stransid order by 1

select cast(cnd as varchar(100)) cnd,flg,0 ord from (select 'Creator'cnd,1 flg union all select 'Reporting manager',3 union all select 'Skip manager',4 union all select 'From form field',6 flg union all select 'User groups',8 flg union all select 'User names',9 flg )a order by flg

select username from axusers order by 1
